summary: The module implements a PyQt5 based control panel that lets users create, edit, display and manage several flight trajectories on the topâ€‘view map. It handles conversion between geographic and planar coordinates, renders the paths, provides access to their longitude/latitude data, and supports adding, removing and updating individual routes. Additional UI components manage operation lists and interaction with the Mscolab collaborative service.
business_intent: Enable users of the MSS platform to efficiently configure and visualise multiple flight paths within a single interface, facilitating planning, monitoring and collaborative sharing of routes.
